definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: At 10 a. m. next day, Secretary-general Yao Haitao met Ms.
sentences.chinese: 次日上午10時，姚海濤祕書長親切會見了陸潔女士。

sentences.english: Mr. President, thank you for your gracious introduction.
sentences.chinese: 校長先生，謝謝你的親切介紹。

sentences.english: Every sentence of kindness was a fresh source of happiness to Jane.
sentences.chinese: 她每說一句親切的話，就增加吉英一分幸福的感覺。

sentences.english: You know you're thought of lovingly each day throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 您知盜我們無日不把你親切思念。

sentences.english: The hall was circumfused with a cordial and friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 大廳中充滿了親切友好的氣氛。

sentences.english: It's small kindnesses like that of the Headmaster that you never forget.
sentences.chinese: 而校長那時的親切關懷，我畢生難忘。
他的嗓音親切而又甜美。

sentences.english: He is often lovingly termed a walking dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 他常被親切地稱爲活字典。

sentences.english: Not exactly cordial, but at least we were talking.
sentences.chinese: 不完全是親切的，但至少我們在會談。

sentences.english: You always gently flying in the mountains, is so close, cordial.
sentences.chinese: 你總是溫柔地飄舞在山間，是那麼親近，親切。

sentences.english: Please call me Lois. First names are more friendly than last names.
sentences.chinese: 請叫我伊洛絲吧，稱呼名子比稱呼姓要更親切一些。
她咧着嘴向我們親切地微笑。

sentences.english: We had a really good phone call. He was very gracious.
sentences.chinese: 我們在電話中談得很好，他非常親切。

sentences.english: Wang and India in the patient at home, Wen Jiabao warmly pulling home.
sentences.chinese: 在患者王福印家，溫家寶親切地拉起家常。

sentences.english: The banquet was full of cordial and friendly atmosphere from beginning to end.
sentences.chinese: 宴會始終充滿親切友好的氣氛。

sentences.english: He also hob-nobbed with executives from Google and other Silicon Valley companies.
sentences.chinese: 他還和來自谷歌和其他硅谷公司的高管親切交談。

definition: care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
